content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, our first story comes from Let George Do It. We hear A Matter Of Doubt, his episode from May 10, 1949.

(30:05) The Epic Casebook closes this week’s show with their episode from October 2, 1969, titled, Murder In The Bag.

Download CaseClosed728

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
